column4: hey guys, is installing "TOO MANY" codecs, from restricted extras, gstreamer, etc etc a "bad" thing that can cause music apps to just stop playing.. or freezes, lockups?
or is that not a big deal in linux having tooo many codecs
shouldnt cause any issues, the programs will use what they want to
as a general rule, apt-get will take care of stuff if there is conflicts, so it either wont allow you to install the new package or will remove the conflicting one
